name: Time's Tear
description:
"trust"

In Time's Tear Kazuhiko and his brother Hideo are orphans living under the supervision of their caretaker. Then, one night, Kazuhiko has a dream. Will it help him pass a test in school?

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2007-08-09. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The character art and the event scenes were done by Cloud^. Backgrounds were created by Kathryn. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Music was composed by Renesis. Estimated completion time is 40 minutes.

Time's Tear is game Nr. 13 of the Original 22.
